This app demonstrates the following parameters of `card_header`:

1. Basic string title
2. `container` parameter to specify a custom HTML container
3. Multiple elements as arguments
4. Custom HTML attributes via `**kwargs`
5. Styling through CSS classes and inline styles
6. Icons and complex HTML structures

The app is minimal and focuses solely on demonstrating `card_header` functionality without unnecessary additional components.

Technical notes:
1. The app uses express mode syntax
2. No external files or data are used
3. Font Awesome is included for icon demonstration
4. All card headers are contained within a single card for easy comparison
5. The app follows Shiny for Python best practices and documentation guidelines

You can run this app and you'll see different variations of card headers demonstrating all the possible parameters and their combinations.
